summary:
Did you ever wanted to wear the Giantsclub like me?!
hehe, than i\'ve got something Special for ya.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows Players and Companions to wear the Dropped Giantclubs when you kill the big giant, there is also something Special near the little lake/river in front of Whiterun, its a Special Giantclub! 

Cheating// no it isnt Cheating, Bethesda just didnt allowed us to use the giantclub as well like a Doublehanded Blade of Madness.

Credits//

Me for Switching Non-Dropable to playable.
bethesda for creating the Creation Kit and TES games, THX!

feel free to use it as your own, just take the Credits (if you wanna share it someweher else) to me and Bethesda.

THX for your Interest, its just a Newbie Mod but i wanna do some Special Animations and Weapons.. everything whats good and make Skyrim better than before.
author: AciDSlayer
